name: SCNPhysicsBodyType
desc: Constants that determine how a physics body interacts with forces and other bodies, used by the type property and when creating a physics body.

items.name: case `static`
items.desc: A physics body that is unaffected by forces or collisions and cannot move.

items.name: case dynamic
items.desc: A physics body that can be affected by forces and collisions.

items.name: case kinematic
items.desc: A physics body that is unaffected by forces or collisions but that can cause collisions affecting other bodies when moved.
